radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis; multiple bilateral pulmonary parenchymal abnormalities are nodular in nature, similar compared to prior chest radiographs; no suggestion of acute infection; no pleural or pericardial effusion. Extensive colonic diverticulosis centered in the sigmoid colon; large diverticula in the area of the hepatic flexure, with significant surrounding stranding and colonic wall thickening.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Similar compared to prior chest radiographs.
